## Quaternion.Euler() method

Returns a rotation that rotates z degrees around the z axis, x degrees around the x axis, and y degrees around the y axis.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Euler(x: number, y: number, z: number): Quaternion;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>number</code> | the rotation on the x axis in euler degrees |
|  y | <code>number</code> | the rotation on the y axis in euler degrees |
|  z | <code>number</code> | the rotation on the z axis in euler degrees |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Quaternion`
